MAESTRO.SETTINGS.HypeTrackEnableH: Enable the ability to set a Track for an Actor
MAESTRO.SETTINGS.restartHypeTracksH: Enable the ability to restart a Track for an Actor instead of always running from the beginning
MAESTRO.SETTINGS.HypeTrackPauseOthersH: Select to pause other Sounds (eg. music) while Hype Track is playing
MAESTRO.SETTINGS.ItemTrackEnableH: Assign a track/playlist to be played when item is rolled
MAESTRO.SETTINGS.ItemTrackCreatePlaylistH: When enabled, playlist will be created if it is not found
MAESTRO.SETTINGS.ItemTrack.ItemIdAttributeH: Used to look for matching Item Id in chat messages
MAESTRO.SETTINGS.CombatTrackEnableH: Assign a track/playlist to be played when combat begins
MAESTRO.SETTINGS.CombatTrackDefaultPlaylistH: Default playlist to use in Combat
MAESTRO.SETTINGS.CombatTrackDefaultTrackH: Default track to use in Combat
MAESTRO.SETTINGS.CombatTrackCreatePlaylistH: When enabled, playlist will be created if it is not found
MAESTRO.SETTINGS.CombatTrack.PauseOthersH: Pause other sounds (eg. scene music) while Combat Track is playing
MAESTRO.SETTINGS.MigrationCurrentVersionH: Holds the version of Maestro that was last migrated
MAESTRO.SETTINGS.DisableDiceSoundH: Disables the default Dice Sounds on roll
MAESTRO.SETTINGS.EnableCriticalSuccessFailureTra: Plays a sound when a critical success/failure is rolled (not supported in all systems)
MAESTRO.SETTINGS.CreateCriticalSuccessPlaylistH: Creates a playlist for Critical Sounds when enabled
MAESTRO.SETTINGS.CriticalSuccessFailureTracksH: Object containing the playlists and sounds for Critical Success/Failure
MAESTRO.SETTINGS.CreateCriticalFailurePlaylistH: Creates a playlist for Failure Sounds when enabled
MAESTRO.SETTINGS.CriticalSuccessFailureTracks.Di: Number of Die Faces/Die Type for Critical Checking
How many faces does the primary game system die have for checking criticals against (eg. 20 for d20)
MAESTRO.SETTINGS.CriticalSuccessFailureTracks.Su: What is the value that a roll must be at or above to critically succeed
MAESTRO.SETTINGS.CriticalSuccessFailureTracks.Fa: What is the value that a roll must be at or below to critically fail
MAESTRO.SETTINGS.ItemTrack.DeletedItemsH: Deleted Item Ids and and their associated Item Tracks
MAESTRO.MAESTRO-CONFIG.Critical.FormPlaylistNote: Select a playlist for Critical Success Tracks
MAESTRO.MAESTRO-CONFIG.Failure.FormPlaylistNotes: Select a playlist for Critical Failure Tracks
MAESTRO.NOTIFICATIONS.MigrationFailed: Maestro | Data migration finished with errors. Please see console for additional details.
MAESTRO.LOGS.MigrationFoundSceneFlags: Maestro | Found Scenes with Playlist flags. Attempting to migrate...
MAESTRO.LOGS.MigrationSceneFlagsFailed: Maestro | Failed to migrate Scene Playlist
MAESTRO.LOGS.MigrationHypeNoPlaylist: Maestro | Hype Tracks playlist not found, Hype Track migration cannot continue.
MAESTRO.LOGS.MigrationHypeNoSounds: Maestro | Hype Tracks playlist has no sounds, Hype Track migration cannot continue.
MAESTRO.LOGS.MigrationHypeFoundActors: Maestro | Found the following Actors with incompatible Hype Tracks:
MAESTRO.LOGS.MigrationHypeAttemptingMatch: Maestro | Attempting to match the old sound selections to the new format...
MAESTRO.LOGS.MigrationHypeNoMatch: Maestro | Cannot find a matching sound for the following Actor:
MAESTRO.LOGS.MigrationHypeSuccessful: Maestro | Successfully mapped Actor to Hype Track!
MAESTRO.LOGS.MigrationItemFound: Maestro | Found the following Items with incompatible Item Tracks:
MAESTRO.LOGS.MigrationItemAttemptingMatch: Maestro | Attempting to match the Item Track to the new format...
MAESTRO.LOGS.MigrationItemNoSound: Maestro | Cannot find a matching sound for the following Item:
MAESTRO.LOGS.MigrationOwnedItemFound: Maestro | Found the following OwnedItems for Actor with incompatible Item Tracks:
MAESTRO.LOGS.MigrationOwnedItemAttemptingMatch: Maestro | Attempting to match the old sound selections to the new format...
MAESTRO.LOGS.MigrationOwnedItemFailed: Maestro | Failed to map Tracks for OwnedItems:
MAESTRO.LOGS.MigrationOwnedItemSuccess: Maestro | Successfully mapped Tracks for OwnedItems:
MAESTRO.LOGS.MigrationTokenOwnedItemsFound: Maestro | Found the following OwnedItems for TokenActor with incompatible Item Tracks:
MAESTRO.LOGS.MigrationTokenOwnedItemsMatched: Maestro | Matched Item Track in Playlist:
MAESTRO.LOGS.MigrationTokenOwnedItemsNotMatched: Maestro | Unable to match flag to track in Playlist:
MAESTRO.LOGS.MigrationTokenOwnedItemFailed: Maestro | Failed to map Tracks for Token OwnedItems:
MAESTRO.LOGS.MigrationTokenOwnedItemSuccess: Maestro | Successfully mapped Tracks for Token OwnedItems:
MAESTRO.HYPE-TRACK.FormNotes: Select the audio file to use as this actor's Hype Track
MAESTRO.HYPE-TRACK.FormTrackNotes: Select the track or playback mode to use as this Actor's Hype Track
MAESTRO.HYPE-TRACK.FormPlaylistNotes: Select the playlist that contains the Hype Track/s to play
MAESTRO.ITEM-TRACK.FormPlaylistNotes: Select a playlist in order to select a track
MAESTRO.ITEM-TRACK.FormTrackNotes: Select a track to play when this item is rolled
MAESTRO.COMBAT-TRACK.FormPlaylistNotes: Select a Playlist for this Combat
MAESTRO.COMBAT-TRACK.FormTrackNotes: Select a Track/Playback Mode to for this combat
